articles.title: Russia's war on Ukraine latest news: Ukraine marks a Soviet-era famine - Reuters.com
articles.description: Ukraine accused the Kremlin on Saturday of using the same "genocidal" tactics that it used against it in the 1930s under Josef Stalin as Kyiv commemorated a <a href="/world/europe/ukraine-presidents-chief-staff-says-russia-will-pay-soviet-era-famine-2022-11-2…
articles.content: Nov 26 (Reuters) - Ukraine accused the Kremlin on Saturday of using the same "genocidal" tactics that it used against it in the 1930s under Josef Stalin as Kyiv commemorated a Soviet-era famine that … [+2335 chars]
